== Git Repository ==

The official source code is in github:

  git clone git://github.com/dacap/aseprite.git

You can [http://github.com/dacap/aseprite browse the source code online].

== Migrating from SourceForge.net ==

If you have already cloned the git repository from !SourceForge, you can switch the origin URL to github with the following command:

  git remote set-url origin git://github.com/dacap/aseprite.git
